message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $20,000. I believe it holds significant value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $16,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I acknowledge your offer, the product's value is considerably higher. I could consider letting it go for $18,500.
Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer and would like to counter with $17,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
